LGR

Hello world, I'm Larry Gaitan-Rodriguez. I'm a engineering Student, from the Metro Atlanta Area, who is learning front-end web developing.

My works

A few projects are a part of the freeCodeCamp Curriculum, a few are from my classes, a few are because I wanted to play around and learn something new.

The works that are shown are not limited to front-end projects. Please do feel free to contact me in regard to any of my projects.

Presidential Tribute

To put to work the first skills learned from the freeCodeCamp Curriculum, the website asks that users create a tribute/bio website of a famous person. At the time I choose president Barack Obama. The Website is made of basic HTML and CSS and no frameworks.

  • See on Codepen
  • Stand alone

First attempt at Portfolio

One of the bigger first projects of freeCodeCamp, the portfolio was meant to be a project in itself and and it was meant to show off other projects. This website is made of HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.

  • See on Codepen
  • Stand alone

Time Converter in Java

One of my first Java programs, I created a program that asked the user the amount of Years, Months, Days, Hours, Minutes they wanted to convert into seconds. I have a detailed write up can be found in the links down below.
